name: Who I am
description:
The Game

"Who I am" is a point and click interactive story. Playing as a lost blind soul, you roam the past, present and the future. Your mind is a mysterious place and you will recover many unknown memories, but in the end you will find the ultimate gift and it will be YOUR CHOICE ONLY how you use it. Uncover a deep story through exploration, interaction and simple puzzle solving.

The Team

Who I Am is one of the three indie games of the Macedonian independent team Shoopy Games. Itch.io is the first place which enables us to receive donations, so we thank the store and greatly appreciate all who donate - you're directly helping all of us to speed up the work of our games.

We hope you enjoy the game!

Art & Game Design: @Shooplor

Code: @Helion1988

Story: @Shooplor & Dino Bojadzievski

Music: Bojan Filipovski

Our Vision

Our greatest wish is to make the indie game community grow. This is why we teach others how to make games on our official blog: http://shooplor.wordpress.com/

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ShoopyGame

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ShoopLor
